<p>Hooks are a new feature in React that I personally find pretty exciting. Shortly after their release in React 16.7., people started<br> developing TypeScript typings via DefinitelyTyped. They’re pretty good, as you don’t have to do much to get all the type safety you need. I put together a little list of things to consider for all hook types in my TypeScript + React guide.</p> <p><a class="read-more" href="/typescript-react/hooks/">Check it out</a></p>
